desc: LegTreats Hosiery is the top US based retailer of pantyhose and stockings from European manufacturers Cecilia de Rafael, Platino, Trasparenze, Fiore, & more! We cover your legs in sexy and indulgent glossy & shiny hosiery and you get your order fast, with FREE SHIPPING! ORDER NOW and get fast delivery.

layout.text: Shop for Cecilia de Rafael brand pantyhose, tights, stockings, thigh highs, & more! Cecilia de Rafael offers many styles for every occasion. FREE SHIPPING on all of Cecilia de Rafael's most popular styles including Eterno, Super Lucido, Chic, Vidrio, Sevilla & more!
